data.quote: Do not let the behavior of others destroy your inner peace.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: What was never lost can never be found.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: Those who are awake, live in a state of constant amazement.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Life is like stepping onto a boat which is about to sail out to sea and sink.
data.author: Shunryu Suzuki

data.quote: Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend
data.author: or a meaningful day.

data.quote: All that we are, is the result of what we have thought. The mind is everything. What we think, we become.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Be master of mind rather than mastered by mind.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Respect life, revere life. There is nothing more holy than life, nothing more divine than life.
data.author: Osho

data.quote: When you seek it, you cannot find it.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: The trouble is, you think you have time.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: To a mind that is still, the whole universe surrenders.
data.author: Chuang Tzu

data.quote: Each morning, we are born again. What we do today is what matters most.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: We shape clay into a pot, but it is the emptiness inside that holds whatever we want.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Move and the way will open.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Our prime purpose in this life is to help others. And if you can
t hurt them.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: If you realize you have enough, you are truly rich.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: When we meet real tragedy in life, we can react in two ways
data.author: either by losing hope and falling into self

data.quote: When the student is ready, the teacher will appear.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: To live a pure unselfish life, one must count nothing as one's own in the midst of abundance.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: When you think everything is someone else fault, you will suffer a lot. When you realize that everything springs only from yourself, you will learn both peace and joy.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Let go, or be dragged.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: The most important point is to accept yourself and stand on your two feet.
data.author: Shunryu Suzuki

data.quote: Have a mind that is open to everything and attached to nothing.
data.author: Tilopa

data.quote: When walking, walk. When eating, eat.
data.author: Zen Proverb

data.quote: Act without expectation.
data.author: Lao Tzu

data.quote: Life begins where fear ends.
data.author: Osho

data.quote: Our sorrows and wounds are healed only when we touch them with compassion.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Love is the absence of judgment.
data.author: Dalai Lama

data.quote: Flow with whatever may happen, and let your mind be free: Stay centered by accepting whatever you are doing. This is the ultimate.
data.author: Chuang

data.quote: We do not exist for the sake of something else. We exist for the sake of ourselves.
data.author: Shunryu Suzuki

data.quote: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.
data.author: Bodhidharma
